name: Scott Barrow
text: don't do little anymore on the washing of your cars and trucks. hit the corner and enjoy the ride.

name: Randy St John
text: Great place to get your truck hand washed

name: Joshua Andrew
text: Good people,they do a hell of job. Would definitely recommend.

name: Miamiholliwood Miamiholliwood
text: Good hand wash but 65$ for bobtail a bit overpriced

name: Benjamin Nichols
text: Will come out for washouts after hours.

name: Yennier Velazquez
text: The service does not work pay $ 110 for the truck and the trailer and look how badly they left it I do not recommend it to anything vote my money if I told a worker and he told me that this was the job the service does not work

name: MAZ Logistics
text: Worst truck wash ever . Plus i paid $120, no go zone.

name: johnny bigmack13
text: Great place nice people good prices.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback , we appreciate your business !!

name: Thomas Buhler
text: These guys do great work. All about the detail.

name: Larry Pate
text: Great prices and the 2 young men working there on 8/15/20 did a outstanding job washing the tractor I was driving. Reminds me of the old Giant truck wash in Jamestown New Mexico keep up the great work.

name: Ilkham Sshugayev
text: Very bad wash

name: Martin Hrtanek
text: Great job guys! Thank you. Good old  fashion truck wash.

name: gabes18wheeler adventures
text: Old style nice good work

name: steve steinmetz
text: Awesome place

resp.text: Thank you Sir !!

name: SHAWN SCOGGS
text: Didn’t do a good job.

name: Lindsey Taylor
text: The food is OK. The ladies that took my order seemed nice. The little girl that was at the cash register was very rude. She sat there looking at her watch checking her message before she rang me up. I had to wait for her to get finished reading her message! Two simple words after paying " Thank you" goes a long ways. But I guess for some people it's too hard for them. People like that little girl shouldn't be working with the public. I will be going across the road from now on.

resp.text:
We truly apologize for the unpleasant experience you had at our location. Can you please tell us the day and time this happened, so we can take necessary actions.You can email me directly   clevelandshellal@gmail.com
Thank you

name: Karla contreras
text: i live in north carolina and but EVERY SINGLE i come back down to bama i HAVE to stop here because the chicken tenders, potato wedges , corn dogs, and pizza rolls bring me so much nostalgia from when i was younger... the chicken tenders are always so crispy and perfect and the potato wedges never fail to amaze my taste buds with honey mustard dude 10/10 recommend.. like #willworkforchickentendersandpotatowedges

name: Christian Evered
text: I work third shift at the Tyson plant just down the road. This is a quick stop on my way home in the morning for a bite to eat, but I will not be back. The help is rude and after a long night at work and as a semi-regular paying customer I do not deserve to be treated as an inconvenience or ignored completely as I'm trying to explain my order. Logan's is about 12-15 minutes out of my way and a bit more expensive but for the bit higher quality of food and much higher quality of help it is worth it to have a decent meal and positive experience than this dealing with this unpleasantness.

name: Eddy Sanchez
text: The food isn’t that good and two of the breakfast staff got my order wrong then told me it’s what I asked for then decided to rude after instead of saying I’m sorry let me fix it for you.

name: Matt Hawkins
text: Asked for wheat toast and would not do it for me

name: Justin Fountain
text: Only shell gas station around. They have a hot bar for food and even though they have great breakfast, there lunch meals are very bad. I got a chicken tender dinner with mac and cheese and turnip greens. They charged me 0.30 cents a cup for honey mustard. I understand it costs them, but at the same time no other place charges for theirs unless you get a few. Not one or two. My friend has complained about the dumplings he received three times since and not a single worker cared.

name: Jenny Ellison
text: I will not be back.  There were 4 female employees at the counter.  Two of them were using profanity talking about another employee who was late and talking about the boss.  They knew I was there and never stopped talking.

resp.text: We truly apologize for the unpleasant experience you had at our location. Can you please tell us the day and time this happened, so we can take necessary actions.Thank you.

text: The food is always amazing !!!!

name: Cynthia Grillas
text: It's okay, it usually costs more than the other two stations in town.  They never seem to have tape in the pumps, which necessitates a trip inside to stand in line to get a receipt, defeating the purpose of paying at the pump.

name: Terry Dean
text: Very nice and friendly service. I recommend this place to anyone.

text: They are open early, and have good biscuits.

text: Jordan has good breakfast sandwiches,  pizza, and great service

text: Really nice small town store!

text: Really good pizza for good price

name: Grim Shadow (Grimshadow1986)
text: There coffee isn't the best but the got a few truck parking spots and one truck fuel pump but all in all it's a shell station.

name: Michael Mansley
text: Good experience

name: Wanda Kelley
text:
There's nothing like visiting a brand new Love's! Everything is fresh and clean and sparkling!
This area very much needed another truck stop. Thank goodness they have Bojangles instead of Arby's or Subway!
They have a large parking area for truck drivers that is very well lit. Surprisingly, they also have a bob-tail parking area just right across the fuel islands. Have a feeling this will become my favorite Love's!

name: Denese Denson
text: I LOVE stopping here before going to work mostly every morning!! The deli ladies are the best!! Kochera goes above and beyond to make sure I have everything I need for my salad. I would definitely recommend all my walmart coworkers to check this spot out for all their favorite foods and snacks.

name: Roger Miller
text: Not a very organized shop been here 3 hrs for a tire theres 7 guys here and only 1 guy wirking man get some better help

name: Ethan Baker
text: by far the best loves I've been to; large, clean lot, good food, good people, clean bathroom/shower, one of the best truck stops I've been to

name: Edwin Saenz
text: It is the best store I have visited, many congratulations to your entire team.

name: Natalie Barnes
text: Love the new Love's! Shay at Bojangles is awesome! Went out of her way to make a special order for me, she is a gem!

name: James Harris
text: New loves truck stop. Just opened so it was very clean. Easy to get to from I-10

name: Virginia ‘Go Go Ginger’ Hall
text: So clean!! The people are friendly. Great showers. Lots of space 😎👍

name: SoonHo Kwon
text: All new, clean restroom!, enjoy loves gas station.

name: Avery
text: Some pumps aren't even marked, and the rest needs a visibility rating of 20/10 vision to view. Your pump #'s are too small!! Let alone on the pump itself the numbers aren't even shown. You have to turn around "in traffic" to squint your eyes and view the pump you're at.

name: Travis Eilerson
text: Chris Tires totally came to my rescue. I had a blowout on I-65 and discovered I had no spare tire in my car. Was driving a Porsche Cayenne SUV with uniquely sized tires. Chris Tires had what I needed and drove all the way out to me to replace my tire on site. Extremely nice attitude throughout and the car is driving great. Highly, highly recommend their service. Also gave me a really great price!!

name: Samantha Johnson
text: Life saver! Got a major flat with no spare at 7pm and called many places claiming to be 24hours that were not! Chris answered and came to our location 30min away immediately without hesitation. Changed our tire out with a new one in 10 minutes flat! He and his wife were amazing and really helped us out trying to get home to our kids. Thank you Chris!

resp.text: God bless y'all and remember to keep him first

name: Christopher Stockton
text: Cheapest and best service I’ve had in a long time. Very responsive to calls and text. Chris was extremely helpful to fix my moms tire when no one else would help. He worked with me on price and was extremely fast.

resp.text: glad i could help yall ne blessed

name: Rashad Nicholas
text: It is Sunday night and no tire shops open and he was here in no time.  Great service.  Very friendly.  Would recommend to anyone who needs tire service.  Affordable.

resp.text: Thanks and be blessed

text: Very helpful, and friendly.. came right out to help my daughter and granddaughter. Ty will definitely call again if needed.

text: Well I have a trip to New Orleans in the morning and I needed 2 front tires. I called all over Mobile and no one had a size 19 rim tire. I was about to cancel my trip until I came across Chris Tries. He was the only one to have my tire. He change my tires today. I didn't have to wait or make an appointment. He was very professional. I highly recommend him. He was great !!!

text: I had a great experience with Chris. He and his associate were efficient and cordial. They came to my employment and replaced my tire on the spot. The price was reasonable as well. They did a great job. I will definitely recommend his services to anyone.

text: Was heading gulf shore from New Orleans, blew a flat in the mobile tunnel, bent the rim completely up. Being after 6, everything was closed, luckily Chris had just what we needed! 10/10

name: luke newton
text: Had a blow out headed to NC called 7 different places no one had the tire size I needed but called Chris Tires and BOOM he only man in town who had the size I needed. Took a little work on a 1 ton 3500 dodge work truck but Chris got me in and out good man just trying to make a living doing what he loves helping others so you all with bad comments don’t see where he is coming from but I did thanks Chris God Bless.

resp.text: Thanks so much

name: Sandi Lemieux
text: Needed my front tires replaced before making a 11 hour trip. This was the week of hurricane Zeta so it was a bit crazy with his schedule but they came and got the job done in the dark at my home with only flashlights because my power was out. Tires are great quality.

name: Carlos Zervigon
text: We got a fast friendly response for a blow out on the I-10. He came to us and we were back on the road in 30 min with a new tire

name: Amy Jackson
text: Very helpful love his kind heart

name: Tiffany Busby
text: Saturday afternoon (4/3/21) I pulled in there to purchase a used tire for my Buick.  The staff was friendly enough, but the price was a little steep $51.50 but, I paid it because I was in need. Drove straight home from there. (about 3miles). Woke up Sunday morning and it was flat. Aired it up enough to get it back up there Monday morning..  When I got there and tell them the problem they took the tire off and said my valve stem was bad and charged me $20 to replace the valve stem. I thought all was good, woke up Tuesday morning it was flat again. I called & spoke to Chris who told me that it was more than likely a cracked rim and there was nothing he could do about it. Today...FRIDAY, I took off work to take my car to Fortners. They first told me that the tire was the wrong size. Then when they got it off the rim they showed me 4 plugs where the tire had been repaired 4 times, previously. For $30 I got an almost perfect Firestone tire, that was the right size with alot of tread. The actions and unprofessionalism at Chris Tires/Havana Tires was ridiculous and I intend to call the BETTER BUSINESS BUREAU.

name: Lexi Reeves
text: Chris was the only person in mobile that was able to help us!! He was here quick!! Thank you Chris!!!

name: Geraldine varner
text: This man is really  good at what he does if any one says different  they a hater I reccomend  him to everyone

text: Came and did tires same day. Came to my house. Cut a good deal for first time customer.  Would definitely recommend. Will be returning

text: Love the care service great service awesome

name: SimbaJKU
text: I brought a tire mounted on the wheel for them to see if they could locate a leak. They were unable to locate the leak but charged me $30 and returned my tire & wheel caked in grease/oil. I had to take the tire home and pressure wash it before I could even install it back on the vehicle. I felt like $30 was WAY too high of a price, especially when they couldn't even find the leak. Maybe the additional filth on the tire and wheel was the reason for the  upcharge...

resp.text: Godbless you

name: Google User
text: I really hate to have to change from 5 stars to 1. But, with that being said.  We spent  $300 on 4 tire the first 2 had blew on the way home.  The 3rd blew out on my to Birmingham.

name: nuttyboi life vlogg
text: They never came to us and this is bad business and I will screenshot it

name: Kathryn Davis
text: I had a trip to Birmingham the next day to take my daughter to her surgery follow up appointment, so I came in the night before to purchase four good used tires. There were only two employees working at the time an I guess they got overwhelmed because more people were in need of service; mind you I was the first customer an they should have been working on my car, but the guy kept stopping to help other people that had pulled up. So finally I had enough an asked the guy to please finish with my car, because I had to go rest before getting on the road (at that time I had been there close to 2 hours). So he did, an I was on my way. We made it through Montgomery without any problems, an then I was awaken by a loud noise, screeching tire sounds, and the sight of my front driver tire rolling away parallel to my truck, heading towards the grassy median. By the grace of God we were not hurt. The inside of the rim was shredded, the bolts were gone, the studs ate up. All this was caused by the a negligent employee that didn't properly tighten the bolts to secure the tire. I spoke with the owner about getting help, but none was offered, an he even tried placing the blame somewhere else. But I will never give Chris Tires anymore of my money/business nor will I recommend them to anyone. I spent over $600 to have my car fixed. I even checked the other tires an the bolts were not secure on them either. Lesson learned, u can't support everyone. I hate that I have to give them one 🌟😡 cause they don't deserve that.

resp.text: Hater

name: Gil Upton
text: They don’t balance your tires and they will be flat in the next morning! And if Chris would stop going around the back of the building every 30 minutes smoking dope he could afford the tools he needs to run a business like this!

text: Great guys took really good care of me and had me in and out really quick

resp.text: Thanks Jeremy you are welcome anytime

name: Anthony Boles
text: Will be back and will recommend to friends and family stayed open for me great prices and friendly

resp.text: Thanks so much looking forward to seeing you again

name: Metro Broad
text: Very professional ,speedy and affordable,the best tire shop in the south hands down

name: Malika Robbins
text: Love they help 24-7

name: Tutti Chaney
text: This place has the worst customer service. I have been waiting over 30 minutes to get help. They started to work on another vehicle before mine. I got a tire from them friday and it has a leak in it. I wouldnt recommend this place to anyone save your time and money

name: Johnnita Burden
text: Love the quality  of there  tires and great service  thanks Chris Tires and staff

name: Safire Music
text:
Came thur to help me in a Time of Need
THANKS Chris Tire and the Team.
#ChrisTires

resp.text: Thanks safire

resp.text: Thanks jj for the review

text: Very good customer service.

name: Joe Dean
text: Awesome atmosphere and service

resp.text: Thanks

name: Justin Taite
text: The new spot! They will take care of you!

resp.text: Thanks Justin

name: christopher marshall
text: I have to Chris just grows on you the customer leaving you in awe of his business  wit.

name: Jonathan Barnes
text: They gave me the wrong size tires

resp.text: Sorry u can replace them with the write ones when you. Come back to the shop must been a mistake

name: Jose Maldonado
text: Good fast service

name: Kendra So BossC
text: Nothing to say...

resp.text: Ok

name: TJF THE JONES Fam
text: Very professional and prompt work

name: Zainab Ali
text: Very great service

name: LaPorsche Philon
text: Upcoming Successors

name: Marilyn Bethel
text: Bad tires

name: BosBama Davis
text: First Come First Served

name: Kimberly Cooper
text: Love the people and the overall atmosphere of this place! We stopped in for gas and drinks, but normally I fuel my semi truck here and buy my smokes and hubbies dip here. Great prices!

name: Mary Bowden
text: Love this store when I want something but I'm not  sure what it is I go here they have really good hot, cold, sandwich of different kinds hot dogs, pizza cheap drinks if you can't find something here that you want your not going to and everyone that works there is so helpful and nice

name: RVPeak
text: Well stocked, great prices but to see a sign on the door saying to wear a mask but the employee at the counter was not wearing his. Sure he is a young guy but we have to take this serious.

name: Chelsie Cooksey
text:
Everything from Management to store was a great experience. The two cashiers that helped us were amazing and extremely sweet. One was training another .  The store was very clean and organized.
The deli food was top notch (buffalo sub and italian sub) and staff making it was quick and polite.
I wish we had more people like this in Texas lol.

name: J R
text: Absolutely disgusting no matter when you come here! They absolutely just don't care! Bathrooms are always dirty feet stick to floor and I have expressed this issue many times and it's always the same.

name: Donshay Robinson
text: The lady at the register was very disrespectful. She bagged my water bottles and refused to bag the rest of my food. I asked can she bag the rest and she said " no you are going to bag them"... I refused to buy the items and left because i shouldn't have to bag my own items. Now i refused to fuel my semi because of her actions. She caused speedway to lose more money than she may have thought.

name: Stella Wages
text: Good fountain drinks. About 20 Truck Parking Spots.

name: Cale Hollingsworth
text: Gas pumps are always broken, store is always dirty, toilets are generally broken and the employees are rude. This store is too new to be this junky. At this point and time I have ZERO intentions of ever going back to this location.

name: Steven Bragg
text: This gas station would be perfect if the fountain distributor for mtn dew products would get the mtn dew cyclone actually working right. Ever since it opened its been nothing but foam coming out of it. Its the only gas station i can go to get it down here i loved it when i was in michigan.

name: EDDIE PULLIN
text: Clean, polite, great fuel prices.

name: Dwight White-Beas
text: 20 car pumps, truck diesel 4 pumps, 21 Truck spaces its great!

name: Aisha Tripp
text: Friendlly staff

name: James Hanson
text: Its number 1 gas station in the area of all

name: Arturo mendoza
text:
(Translated by Google) Estremadamente chichino

(Original)
Estremadamente chichino

name: Nikki Dole
text: Very nice ladies, clean restrooms and the food was amazing.  Definitely added this truck stop to our route.

name: Jason Shoumaker
text: I stopped to get a great breakfast for me and my brother as we run teams, 1 of only 2 truck stops that had become a must to stop when traveling on I-22 but after this am it will become a place that we will not stop at for anything there's only 2 toilets in men's restroom one was occupied and the other was absolutely disgusting, it had feces all over toilet seat, told cashier about it and asked to use a shower for restroom and was told nope thats what the restrooms are for.

name: Sergio Leyva
text: Big parking lot. Friendly staff. Truck diesel. Not much food but huddle house next door

name: Robert Martin
text: The people are friendly, the food from the cafe inside was delicious, only down fall is the mens room, it was nasty, only 1 stall was working and a line of people waiting to use it.

name: Tony
text: Great place for finding parking. Huge lot with a small paved section with the rest being gravel. Virtually no holes in the gravel which was great. Inside was alright and the bathrooms could use some attention.

name: MusicMovesMe78
text:
4/21/21 - still set this lovely place on my route for this good home cooking. Tonight for dinner: fried fish fillets, turnip greens, mashed potatoes, regular cornbread, and a piece of birthday sprinkle vanilla cake with lemon frosting for dessert. Finish it off with a cup of sweet tea. ❤ (Obviously I like their fried fish fillets.)

Also, they have since remodeled the restrooms and have added showers for $10.00 each. Dont listen to the folks who are fussin' in the comment section here. Come on in and try out Cafe 30, great truck parking (if you get in at a decent time) and friendly folks inside. 👍🏻👍🏻

2019:  Who needs Huddle House next door when you have a diner like this in the truck stop? Super good food and friendly customer service. Not hating on Huddle House. They're great, too ... but this? This is that food right here.

name: Linda Danahy
text:
Just your average convenient store.
However, the food in the deli is so delicious.
Freshly made with homemade taste.
Worth the stop.
Big rig truck parking.
Saving this place on my GPS.

name: Phillip Vineyard
text: Really good food. They serve breakfast and the pancakes are as big as a to go box hot and delicious. The lady that was working the morning of 4-8-2020 was really nice (and pretty) worth stopping for, big parking lot the back is a little rough bc its gravel front lot is paved. ENJOY !!!!!

name: shelby phillips
text: Country fried steak was delicious... Cashier was super friendly... Don't let the outside appearance fool you... It's worth the stop!

name: arc gaming
text: Women’s bathroom had several holes in the wall and a large hole in the ceiling. Felt kinda creepy, but we had been on the toad awhile, so whatever. My husband paid for our gas but then My daughter wanted a snack...A pack of gum and a bag cheese it’s. Was around $3. Lady at the register told me that they don’t allow purchases under $5 on a card...only cash. So I told her to keep it. Cashier even made the comment that they get a lot of angry customers because of it. I can see why. Went across the street to the Shell station. Much cleaner, the same items were about a dollar cheeped and they didn’t mind to do business transactions under $5 dollars. Wish we had given them out gas business too. Will remember that next time.

name: Jourdan Lowery
text: Looks better cashier are friendlier since the new management took over last week great food at the cafe 30 the manager already got new locks on the stall doors and they sell phone cards again they even have a small dog park now where travelers can walk their dogs

name: Truckin Games
text: Review just for the parking. Usually can find spots most of the time.

name: Truth and Justice
text: Great home cooked food for a great price! Meat and two sides with a drink and bread of your choice only $8! Nice little place to sit down and eat with a tv! Tons of parking in the gravel lot out back! Good experience here every time!

name: Max Cady
text: My wife and I usually stop in this place once or twice a year when driving from Memphis to Atlanta, religiously we purchase a new US road atlas map in this store. We noticed they stopped carrying road maps and atlases, plus they got rid of all sorts of stuff. So we drove down to Loves truck stop and got a new atlas map there. We will now go to Loves from now on. It’s around exit 50

name: Loren Collins
text: Clutch place to park . Lots of truck parking. Huge lot. Nice food. Was low on hours needed a place to stop. Good phone signal 👍

name: Cynthia Keene
text: Cafe 30 in the Chevron station has the best homemade food. The roast beef w/potatoes & carrots, purple hull beans, cabbage and cornbread was very tasty.

name: Joseph Bennett
text: Get a filling meal for under 10 dollars. Plenty of paved and unpaved big rig parking. Sassy workers that make you smile and a place to sit, that isn't that truck. Overall a decent experience. They do have a huddle House next door, if you are to uppity to eat good southern cooking.

name: Tammy Harbin
text: Awesome homemade hamburgers , employees are nice good parking and fuel prices are great bathrooms need a little over haul but great place

name: Norbert D Dounseroux
text: I chose to stop here seeing I hadn't been here in a couple years. I have no problem supporting the little stops and was surprised to see they finally saved enough money to asphalt some of the truck parking. I guess the stripes will come way later. My offense was the men's room, smells, no locks on the stalls, and trash on the floor. You have a long way to go!

name: Karl Wolf
text:
Nice place for a driver to stop and get a bite to eat. Food is reasonable and served with a smile.
Plenty of truck parking as long as you park properly.
Not sure about all the bad reviews regarding the restrooms, its not a 5 star hotel and was adequate for my needs.
Will stop here again.

name: BOGUS Blank
text: Women behind counter said nothing at all.when I go to a normal place of business I am usually greeted with hello may I help you.not here made me feel like I did something wrong or maybe my long hair out of place for the southern folks.when I did get my food of which I ordered to go I had to ask for a bag.oh bathroom stalls are falling apart and no paper towels in bathroom how is a trucker going to wash their face and dry it?oh I know stick your head in the blow dryer! Other than all that it's a place to park and go to the restroom as long as you don't expect any privacy when you sit on the toilet.

name: Ana Shomaker
text:
This place was disgusting, the guy who runs it is trash too. I told him the restrooms were beyond filthy and he told me that it was only him there and that he has 1 person come clean it at night, I told him they could do a better job because it doesn’t look like anything has been wiped down swept or mopped or weeks.
It’s prolly got parasites all over the place.

It’s even more disappointing that when I told the man he didn’t even apologize he just argued with me about it.
Also across the board the gas has been anywhere from 2.30 to 2.50 and his gas was way over priced at 2.75.
Pretty sure he was selling cigarettes to underage kids as well.

name: GaryMac
text: Great food at great prices. Them girls in there can cook. A lot of truck parking. And if you don't like home cooking there is a Huddle House next door. I stop here all the time. Good place.

name: Sean Kerno
text: Bathrooms are fairly rundown. There's no way to make sure your stall cannot be opened once inside. They do have any snacks or drinks you could want. But if looking for a restroom, I'd keep driving.

name: J Dial
text: Really good stop! Home style cooking 🍳😍. It's clean and the people are friendly. Good location for a nap or simple pit stop. Always a stopping spot on the roadtrip

name: Brian Chapman
text:
Not a thing wrong with this stop.  It was Memorial day weekend so they weren't cooking.  LARGE amount of parking.  The pot holes weren't so bad. The men's room was clean while I was there.  No smell either.
I didn't use the stalls so don't know if if they locked or not.

If people are so fearful of the restrooms I don't know why they don't go next door to the Huddle House.

name: Pamela Cloud
text: Good food nice portions nice staff breakfast lunch dinner cakes are moist

name: Noble Eagle
text: Awesome food. More than you can handle. If you go away hungry,  it's your fault.

name: Theresa Lowery
text: Great place good food clean restroom  friendly staff really loved the chevron even the parking lot was  clean

name: Tiffany Caballero
text: This place is clean, it has a good selection and the employees are so friendly and helpful. I definitely recommend it.

name: Ray
text: Incredible home cooked breakfast. And the best french toasts in the country.

name: Steve Whisenant
text: Nice stop. Good food.

name: John Kranz
text: The food is really good, the people are friendly, plenty of parking, however the men's room was delapated and they have no milk, but a lot of beer

name: Bobby Kiselak
text: Plenty of parking for big vehicles, especially 18 wheelers. There's a small kitchen here with some booths. The restrooms need updating/more cleaning, but overall it serves it's purpose as a wanna be truck stop.

name: Andrea Scott
text: If I could give 0 stars I would. I am a woman truck driver and this bathroom was absolutely unacceptable, I've been through my fair share of truck stop bathrooms and this was by far the worst! One toilet seat wasn't even on the toilet and the other toilet was stuffed with toilet paper to the point where I was scared to flush it to try to use the bathroom. I don't understand how so many women work here and that bathroom is not decent, you have to use that bathroom all day! Living in a truck these bathrooms are my only options and I've never been so pissed, sad sad excuse for a truck stop! If you have a wife or you are a woman truck driver do yourself a favor and pass this exit, for your own health. I'm very upset about having to stop here for the night.

name: christopher falkenberry
text: Food is great!!!!!!! People are nice no showers but lots of parking. 150+ parking spaces for semi.

name: Mark Summers
text: Excellent burger. Nice folks.

name: Nathan Shelton
text: Sorry excuse for a truck stop only thing good about it is they have some parking

name: David Moreno
text: The food is good the the people are really nice to you the only bad thing is that they don't have any showers plenty of parking

name: Bob Kernahan
text: Great place plenty of truck parking great people and good food

name: Douglas Carmen
text: Lots of truck parking. Good food. Friendly people.

name: Geoffrey Stephens
text: Easy on /off huge parking area, good food.

name: ANN WISE
text: Huddle house next door.

name: Mj
text: Good food here

name: HARRY LEE WILSON
text: The atmosphere and food is excellent.

name: Hershel Thompson
text: Your average truck stop, nothing grand about it. Large amount of truck parking.

name: Pete Ward
text: Good food,no showers,lots of truck parking

name: Thomas Stetina
text: “Underclothes”???  Stank... enough said.

name: Roy Willingham
text: Gd food lots of parking

name: Melissa Montoya
text: Lots of parking spots

name: john Connell
text: Very dirty store. The left side where the trucks fill up is covered in trash. It looks like a dump

name: Joseph King
text: Major dive. Totally ran down with no services.

name: K Owens
text: Nice little mom & pop operation, wish it was open 24hrs though.

name: Kyle Taylor
text: The gas price listed is a lie. It was 2.70 for regular. And card didn't work at the pump.

name: David Cummings
text: Convenient but very dirty.

name: Abu Anas
text: Great customer service and food

name: Dane Bishop
text: Expensive and location money shark

name: Billy Williams
text: Best burgers in the area 👌 hands down great service and staffing there is also a cat scale here not to mention it's very convenient location right off of Hwy 43 right down the street from ssab and a lot of other industrial plants and you can't forget ice cold beer

name: Wayne Hughett
text: Very nice people with new owners who are constantly updating the store like they now have Uhaul services!  Good down home country cooking for breakfast and lunch only tho.  Definitely worth a stop by!!

name: Carroll Bird
text: They have a good breakfast and lunch buffet

name: Charles Hall
text: Not bad but I've had better

name: Vick Barnes
text: Employees was very nice dining area was very clean food was good Weider was consistent on making sure you have what you need

name: Wesley Melton
text: Cup lol TV Po pop pk.  Cfv vvfgrg

name: One note at a time - Lee Jones
text: If you like fried chicken well this is the place!

name: Dr. Jack Overcasher, Sr.
text: Clean bathrooms, great service.

name: David Brown
text:
Great i.thin to

My my

name: Jennifer Byrd
text: Soooooooo gggggoooooooddddddd

name: Scott M
text: Good food

name: terry bassett
text: Good home cooking

name: Olivia Rivers
text: Good food

name: Bryan Fuenmayor
text: Great food and service.

name: Brian Dodd (BD)
text: Ugh

name: Christopher Jones
text: Great food and great service!

name: Kendel Burdett
text: They have men and women sharing the same restroom without a door lock

name: Abu Anas
text: Lots of food. Great place to sit with the family and eat

name: Kevin Andrews
text: Food was very late on delivery. Will not order anything else from them, lady lied every time I called to see when they will arrive. Food was 25 minutes late and cold, it's only 3/4, of a mile from A to B, and order was wrong.

resp.text: I am sorry Kevin, Before 2 week ago we must Busy and shortage in employees, But Now You get your order On time our delivery Time In SSAB-10.35,Lenzing-10.45,Neuroun-10.50,Arkema-11.00,Us amines -11.05 ,FMC&Amvac-11.15.  and are consider Your Noticed that our food is colder,we will try our best to keep food hot.If You have any Problem regarding Delivery call on store Phone and ask for me(AJ).

name: TJ Jones The Bull of the Woods
text: First time here, staying overnight do to lack of  freight in the area today. Small lot in back for trucks. Hold 10 maybe. Cat scale. They have a restaurant inside with fair prices. Convenient store and truck fuel. There are some feral cats running around (((Wheres my BB gun))) JK!

name: PS PS
text: The women in their have no clue how to use a com data corporate card. They asked me to swipe it in the front credit card machine, I advised them that's not the way it's done they must take the card from me and enter my information ,my trip number, my driver code, my miles, my truck number. They didn't do it and told  me that the card was declined. The worst thing is they got really snooty about it. At that point I decided to  Get fuel at Pilot.  Also I called to get permits and they told me there fax machine is not working Go in there be prepared to get a large dose of attitude by single women.  The moral of the story is if you wanna use your comdata card go to the pilot down the road until they learn how to use it

name: Willis Young (WEY)
text: Great country cooking at a fair price.

resp.text: thanks and do visit us again

name: Brant Smith
text: My morning stop. Good people.

resp.text: Thanks Mr. smith for your business.

name: Lee Robinson
text: Great burger

resp.text: Thank you sir. Appreciate for Bussiness

name: gunter ballard
text: I travel thru this location , regularly peeve of mine , especially when raining, to have to go inside to get gas receipt. It's a new location, can you not afford the paper

name: Katrina Shepherd
text: Great customer service great job on cleaning truck and inside trailer very convenient to i85 interstate down from Torch 85 truck stop great prices also

resp.text: Way to start the weekend!  Thanks Shepherd for the review!  We appreciate it! Glad to know that we did our job!  Stay safe on the roads and hope to do business with you again.

name: Lora Bishop
text: Was in and out.I chatted with the lady taking my payment,very nice

resp.text: That's our goal!  Thanks Bishop for the feedback!  I'll make sure to share this with Dee-Dee!  Hope to do business with you again.  Stay safe!

name: DG Adkison
text: I know the owner of H&H let them wash it. Any problems tell kenny he will make it right. Good people

resp.text: You got that right Adkison!  We try to get you right!  Thanks for the review buddy!  Stay safe.

name: Ronnie Allen
text:
This place is exactly in truck wash I tried to get my truck wash here when I do need a truck wash
This place is lot better than the Blue Beacon truck wash and for the price can not beat it only thing they are not open 24hrs and close on Sunday which the
Blue beacon on most of them are
Open 24/7
I like H&H truck wash a lot
I may stop by in the morning to get my truck wash by them before I head home

resp.text: Ronnie sorry for the late response; but I am thankful for the positive review!  Sunday, I like to give them a rest, so we can be up and running come Monday!  Thank you for your support and hope to do business with you again~

name: Dennis Blumer
text: 6 people working and 6 begging for tips before it was even done! I tipped them but I won’t go back there! Dusty gravel drive to get out! These pics show job well done.....well...job done!

resp.text: Dennis, sorry to hear about your experience you had back in 2018.  You guys spoke and we listened.  We moved in 2019 - still exit 42 - right off the exit. If you ever around, stop by.   Usually we are ready to serve you w/ absolutely no waiting!  Hopefully we will be of service to you again.

name: J-rod Carriers
text: I generally don’t like independent truck wash places, often takes too long but these guys are good, quick and good. Will definitely come back

resp.text: J-Rod Carriers - this is what we like to hear!  We appreciate your feedback and we thank you for allowing us to service you.  Hope to see you again.

name: Sheldon Williams
text: Stop by to get my truck wash dirt and gravel driveway going in-and-out. They took about 10 minutes to watch the truck. I had to go to the gas station to rinse off the chemicals from the side. I'll never go there again nor do I recommend them. This by far was the worst truck wash I have been to.

resp.text:
Williams thank you for taking time to express your concern regarding your wash today.  With each wash, we try to do a walk through to ensure we didn't miss any spots and we encourage our patrons to do the same.  As you noted, we got you in and out within 10mins, if you would of called - I would of had the boys to clean you back off, in no time.
Sorry we didn't meet your expectations; but we wish you safe travels out there buddy.

name: matthew poll
text: I visited this truck wash today at 4pm, there were 4 guys on duty. I drive a motor coach. I kicked up a bunch of dust and dirt as I pulled into the lot as I was moving faster than I should have. There was no wait, no other vehicle in the bay. By the time I had walked over to the office, paid for the wash, and walked back over to the bus they were done. I was charged $50, which I thought was fair. Owner even offered to rinse me off if I get dusty between now and the football game on Saturday. I will definitely be back. I drove off really slowly and didn’t kick up any dust. Owner said it’s been dry and he needs to water the gravel driveway area.

name: V.I. Cowboy
text: The guys did a great job on my reefer at a reasonable price.

resp.text: Clifford, we are glad to have your support!  I'll make sure to share it with the guys!  See you soon!

name: Brad Driver
text: They washed my engine compartment, and permanently damaged my ecm. I will never return

resp.text: Brad sorry to hear about your ECM.  We didn't wash out any engines today.  So unsure of when or how this happen to you.  As we both know, an ECM doesn't get damage that easily (permanently) with one wash.  Sounds like you were having trouble beforehand. A wet ECM/filter may cause a crankcase pressure code - but usually goes away within a couple of miles - not permanently damage buddy.  Thanks for your review.  Hope to have your business again in the future.

name: John Neely
text: Great wash

resp.text: Neely thank you for letting us service you!  We appreciate the 5-star rating!  We hope to see you again soon.  Be safe

name: Jeffrey Chailland
text: Awesome washout, friendly employees

resp.text: Hey Jeffrey!  Glad to have serviced you.  Thanks for the review.  We hope to see you again!

name: Lee McKee
text: The are priced fairly. They do a great job.

name: Black Coral
text: Doesn't give a wash ticket. Uses only a pressure washer **(Calls it a steamer) **and leaves the tank wet.  Refuses to generate one and doesn't answer or return your call.  Very very unprofessional.. DO NOT USE HIS SERVICES IF YOU NEED A CLEAN TANK...

resp.text: Hey Coral, sorry to see your low rating.  Every wash, whether it's trailer, clean out or a simple car wash gets a handwritten receipt.  Just a tidbit for yourself - the washer we use is an industrial steam pressure washer.  Oddly, I never received a voice message from you.  Unsure if you dial the wrong number - but you can reach me anytime during business hours at 334-724-9415.  Hopefully one day we will service you .

name: Lee Godfrey
text: Good people always do a fantastic job..

name: Gina Doyle
text: Best customer service, no long waiting time. My trucks are clean with a shine. Pricing is affordable. New location across bridge from New Gas station.

name: Victor Griffin
text: After paying $90 for a truck and trailer wash the guys that washed them held their hands out for a tip!!!!!!! Here's a great tip!!! When you learn how to wash a truck and trailer you might get some money as a tip!!!! Sorry job!!!!!!!!

name: Theresa Cruz
text: They do a great job!!

name: Ed Gamiy
text: $45 for washout and walls still dirty.

name: Glenn Barrett
text: Stay away from this truck wash for one they don't do a good job at cleaning your truck number to everybody's got their hand out for a tip for a job not well done number 3 when you leave out the truck wash the gravel parking way in area to leave is flying dust and dirt all back on your truck horrible place to get your truck washed

name: david harris
text: Not to satisfied truck was sretaked when it dried

name: john doe 1995
text: Quality truck wash , a bit old school , but excellent customer service and wash ! I will be back often, thanks.  🚛  😆

name: Frank Adamy III
text: Quick and great service

name: Perry Panovec
text: Great service

name: Grant Sims
text: Piss poor run down clean truck is a happy truck the idiot on the cb needs to stop lieing when you leave out of the wash bay your truck gets right back dirty because of dirt parking lot the food had mold Roach in my plate this crap hole needs to be condemned fast

name: Christo Magana
text: I will miss this Texaco , especially the brunette that works here. I will miss u guys. Thanks for being cool with me.

name: donna “Dee Dee or donna jean” rothamer
text: Had lil bit of everything in there and that would be hard to do, but they do it 😀 friendly staff also....its a nice place to stop for gas & goods 😁

text: Great place to  stop and rest, fuel your bike, and fuel your belly!

text: Good cold beer . always a happy smiling face at the check out.

text: Very nice people great food and a huge lot to park your rig overall great little place

name: Coney Rabbit

text: It's always clean, and easy to get in an out of, the food is really good, try the biscuits.
